#summary This page describes how to build source code.
#labels Featured,Phase-Implementation

= Prerequisites =

The following software is required in order to build source code:
 # [http://maven.apache.org/ Maven 2.2.1 or later]
 # [http://java.com/ Java 1.6 or later]

= Building with Maven =

If everything is OK with your environment then the following will build a binary distribution in target directory:
{{{
cd Chat
mvn install
}}}

= Editing, compiling and running in IntelliJ IDEA =

The following instructions were tested with [http://www.jetbrains.com/idea/ IntelliJ IDEA] IC-90.96 and Gentoo Linux. However, they should be valid for many other versions of IDEA and OSes.
 * Start IntelliJ IDEA
 * Import Maven project from Chat/pom.xml
